Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Sinus Node Dysfunction
Record.Description: A derangement in the normal functioning of the sinoatrial node. Typically, SA node dysfunction is manifest as sinoatrial exit block or sinus arrest, but may present as an absolute or relative bradycardia in the presence of a stressor. It may be associated with bradycardia-tachycardia syndrome
